Open packages and get random gifts.
en.Your Blackjack deals 50 damage instead o: Your Blackjack deals 50 damage instead of 40.
en.When you play 16 or 17, restore +5 healt: When you play 16 or 17, restore +5 health.
en.Chance to reflect damage back to the opp: Chance to reflect damage back to the opponent. %20
en.Increase damage by 5 when playing 15, 16: Increase damage by 5 when playing 15, 16 or 17.
en.If you take 18 or less damage, you have: If you take 18 or less damage, you have a 50% chance to block all damage.
Take 2 damage to deal extra 3 damage.
en.Welcome! Are you ready to become a fearl: Welcome! Are you ready to become a fearless pirate?
en.Now, let me explain some of the things y: Now, let me explain some of the things you can do.
en.Join tournaments and defeat your opponen: Join tournaments and defeat your opponents. The one with the most trophies calls the shots!
en.You will constantly receive random tasks: You will constantly receive random tasks. Complete the tasks and earn rewards by finding the specified cards.
en.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: You earn 2 stars for completing each level. Collect all the stars to unlock rewards.
en.Collect your rewards at regular interval: Collect your rewards at regular intervals!
en.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Solve the fun puzzles. They help you earn rewards.
en.Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewa: Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewards!
en.You can check the current standings in t: You can check the current standings in the tournament and the overall rankings.
en.At the end of each level, you have a cha: At the end of each level, you have a chance to win cards. Complete collections with these cards and earn rewards.
en.When it's your turn, you must draw a car: When it's your turn, you must draw a card. If you exceed 21, you cannot attack. If you hit 21, your damage is doubled!

Paketleri aç ve rastgele hediyeler kazan.
tr.If you take 18 or less damage, you have: 18 veya daha az hasar alırsanız, tüm hasarı engelleme şansınız %20.
Ekstra 3 hasar vermek için 2 hasar alırsınız.
tr.Welcome! Are you ready to become a fearl: Hoşgeldin! Korkusuz bir korsan olmak için hazır mısın?
tr.Join tournaments and defeat your opponen: Turnuvalara katılıp rakiplerini yenmelisin. En çok kupaya sahip olanın dediği olur!
tr.You will constantly receive random tasks: Sürekli olarak rastgele görevler alacaksın. Görevleri tamamla ve belirtilen kartları bularak ödüller kazan.
tr.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: Her seviyeyi tamamladığında 2 yıldız kazanırsın. Tüm yıldızları toplayarak ödüllerin kilidini aç.
tr.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Eğlenceli bulmacaları çöz. Bunlar sana ödül kazandırır.
tr.You can check the current standings in t: Turnuvadaki son durumu ve genel sıralamayı kontrol edebilirsin.
tr.At the end of each level, you have a cha: Her seviyenin sonunda kart kazanma şansın var. Bu kartlarla koleksiyonları tamamla ve ödüller kazan.
tr.When it's your turn, you must draw a car: Sıra sendeyken kart çekmelisin. Eğer 21'i geçersen atak yapamazsın. 21'i bulursan hasarını katlarsın!

Ouvre les paquets et reçois des cadeaux aléatoires.
fr.Your Blackjack deals 50 damage instead o: Votre Blackjack inflige 50 dégâts au lieu de 40.
fr.When you play 16 or 17, restore +5 healt: Lorsque vous jouez 16 ou 17, restaurez +5 de santé.
fr.Chance to reflect damage back to the opp: Chance de refléter les dégâts à l'adversaire. %20
fr.Increase damage by 5 when playing 15, 16: Augmentez les dégâts de 5 en jouant 15, 16 ou 17.
Augmentez la santé de 5 en jouant 19 ou 20.
fr.If you take 18 or less damage, you have: Si vous subissez 18 dégâts ou moins, vous avez 50% de chance de tout bloquer.
Subissez 2 dégâts pour infliger 3 dégâts supplémentaires.
fr.Welcome! Are you ready to become a fearl: Bienvenue ! Êtes-vous prêt à devenir un pirate sans peur ?
fr.Now, let me explain some of the things y: Maintenant, laissez-moi expliquer certaines choses que vous pouvez faire.
fr.Join tournaments and defeat your opponen: Participez à des tournois et battez vos adversaires. Celui qui a le plus de trophées prend les décisions !
fr.You will constantly receive random tasks: Vous recevrez constamment des tâches aléatoires. Terminez les tâches et gagnez des récompenses en trouvant les cartes spécifiées.
fr.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: Vous gagnez 2 étoiles pour chaque niveau terminé. Collectez toutes les étoiles pour débloquer des récompenses.
fr.Collect your rewards at regular interval: Collectez vos récompenses à intervalles réguliers !
fr.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Résolvez les puzzles amusants. Ils vous aident à gagner des récompenses.
fr.Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewa: N'oubliez pas la roue avec des récompenses incroyables !
fr.You can check the current standings in t: Vous pouvez vérifier le classement actuel dans le tournoi et les classements généraux.
fr.At the end of each level, you have a cha: À la fin de chaque niveau, vous avez une chance de gagner des cartes. Complétez les collections avec ces cartes et gagnez des récompenses.
fr.When it's your turn, you must draw a car: Quand c'est votre tour, vous devez piocher une carte. Si vous dépassez 21, vous ne pouvez pas attaquer. Si vous atteignez 21, vos dégâts sont doublés !

Apri i pacchi e ottieni regali casuali.
it.Your Blackjack deals 50 damage instead o: Il tuo Blackjack infligge 50 danni invece di 40.
it.Chance to reflect damage back to the opp: Possibilità di riflettere il danno all'avversario. %20
it.Chance to absorb incoming damage. %20: Possibilità di assorbire i danni in arrivo. %20
it.Increase damage by 5 when playing 15, 16: Aumenta i danni di 5 quando giochi 15, 16 o 17.
Aumenta la salute di 5 quando giochi 19 o 20.
it.If you take 18 or less damage, you have: Se subisci 18 o meno danni, hai il 50% di possibilità di bloccare tutti i danni.
Subisci 2 danni per infliggere 3 danni extra.
it.Welcome! Are you ready to become a fearl: Benvenuto! Sei pronto a diventare un pirata senza paura?
it.Now, let me explain some of the things y: Ora, lascia che ti spieghi alcune cose che puoi fare.
it.Join tournaments and defeat your opponen: Partecipa ai tornei e sconfiggi i tuoi avversari. Chi ha più trofei comanda!
it.You will constantly receive random tasks: Riceverai costantemente compiti casuali. Completa i compiti e guadagna premi trovando le carte specificate.
it.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: Guadagni 2 stelle per completare ogni livello. Raccogli tutte le stelle per sbloccare i premi.
it.Collect your rewards at regular interval: Raccogli i tuoi premi a intervalli regolari!
it.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Risolvendo i divertenti puzzle, puoi guadagnare premi.
it.Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewa: Non dimenticare la ruota con premi incredibili!
it.You can check the current standings in t: Puoi controllare la classifica attuale del torneo e la classifica generale.
it.At the end of each level, you have a cha: Alla fine di ogni livello, hai la possibilità di vincere carte. Completa le collezioni con queste carte e guadagna premi.
it.When it's your turn, you must draw a car: Quando è il tuo turno, devi pescare una carta. Se superi 21, non puoi attaccare. Se raggiungi 21, i tuoi danni sono raddoppiati!

Öffne Pakete und erhalte zufällige Geschenke.
de.When you play 16 or 17, restore +5 healt: Wenn du 16 oder 17 spielst, stelle +5 Gesundheit wieder her.
de.Chance to reflect damage back to the opp: Chance, Schaden an den Gegner zurückzugeben. %20
de.Increase damage by 5 when playing 15, 16: Erhöhe den Schaden um 5, wenn du 15, 16 oder 17 spielst.
Erhöhe die Gesundheit um 5, wenn du 19 oder 20 spielst.
de.If you take 18 or less damage, you have: Wenn du 18 oder weniger Schaden erleidest, hast du eine 50% Chance, allen Schaden zu blockieren.
Nimm 2 Schaden, um 3 zusätzlichen Schaden zu verursachen.
de.Welcome! Are you ready to become a fearl: Willkommen! Bist du bereit, ein furchtloser Pirat zu werden?
de.Now, let me explain some of the things y: Lass mich dir jetzt einige Dinge erklären, die du tun kannst.
de.Join tournaments and defeat your opponen: Nimm an Turnieren teil und besiege deine Gegner. Derjenige mit den meisten Trophäen hat das Sagen!
de.You will constantly receive random tasks: Du wirst ständig zufällige Aufgaben erhalten. Erledige die Aufgaben und verdiene Belohnungen, indem du die angegebenen Karten findest.
de.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: Du erhältst 2 Sterne für das Abschließen jedes Levels. Sammle alle Sterne, um Belohnungen freizuschalten.
de.Collect your rewards at regular interval: Sammle deine Belohnungen in regelmäßigen Abständen!
de.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Löse die lustigen Rätsel. Sie helfen dir, Belohnungen zu verdienen.
de.Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewa: Vergiss das Rad mit den tollen Belohnungen nicht!
de.You can check the current standings in t: Du kannst die aktuellen Platzierungen im Turnier und die Gesamtwertung einsehen.
de.At the end of each level, you have a cha: Am Ende jedes Levels hast du die Chance, Karten zu gewinnen. Vervollständige Sammlungen mit diesen Karten und verdiene Belohnungen.
de.Let's play the first battle!: Lass uns die erste Schlacht spielen!
de.When it's your turn, you must draw a car: Wenn du an der Reihe bist, musst du eine Karte ziehen. Wenn du 21 überschreitest, kannst du nicht angreifen. Wenn du 21 erreichst, wird dein Schaden verdoppelt!

Abre paquetes y recibe regalos aleatorios.
es.Your Blackjack deals 50 damage instead o: Tu Blackjack inflige 50 de daño en lugar de 40.
es.When you play 16 or 17, restore +5 healt: Cuando juegas 16 o 17, restaura +5 de salud.
es.Chance to reflect damage back to the opp: Probabilidad de reflejar el daño al oponente. %20
es.Chance to absorb incoming damage. %20: Probabilidad de absorber el daño entrante. %20
es.Increase damage by 5 when playing 15, 16: Aumenta el daño en 5 al jugar 15, 16 o 17.
Aumenta la salud en 5 al jugar 19 o 20.
es.If you take 18 or less damage, you have: Si recibes 18 o menos daño, tienes un 50% de probabilidad de bloquear todo el daño.
es.Chance to deal double damage. %20: Probabilidad de infligir el doble de daño. %20
Recibe 2 de daño para infligir 3 de daño extra.
es.Welcome! Are you ready to become a fearl: ¡Bienvenido! ¿Estás listo para convertirte en un pirata intrépido?
es.Now, let me explain some of the things y: Ahora, déjame explicarte algunas de las cosas que puedes hacer.
es.Join tournaments and defeat your opponen: Únete a torneos y derrota a tus oponentes. ¡El que tenga más trofeos manda!
es.You will constantly receive random tasks: Recibirás tareas aleatorias constantemente. Completa las tareas y gana recompensas encontrando las cartas especificadas.
es.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: Ganas 2 estrellas por completar cada nivel. ¡Reúne todas las estrellas para desbloquear recompensas!
es.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Resuelve los divertidos rompecabezas. Te ayudan a ganar recompensas.
es.Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewa: ¡No olvides la ruleta con increíbles recompensas!
es.You can check the current standings in t: Puedes revisar las posiciones actuales en el torneo y los rankings generales.
es.At the end of each level, you have a cha: Al final de cada nivel, tienes la oportunidad de ganar cartas. Completa colecciones con estas cartas y gana recompensas.
es.When it's your turn, you must draw a car: Cuando sea tu turno, debes robar una carta. Si superas 21, no puedes atacar. Si alcanzas 21, ¡tu daño se duplica!

Abra pacotes e receba presentes aleatórios.
pt.Your Blackjack deals 50 damage instead o: Seu Blackjack causa 50 de dano em vez de 40.
pt.When you play 16 or 17, restore +5 healt: Quando você joga 16 ou 17, restaure +5 de saúde.
pt.Chance to reflect damage back to the opp: Chance de refletir o dano de volta para o oponente. %20
pt.Chance to absorb incoming damage. %20: Chance de absorver o dano recebido. %20
pt.Increase damage by 5 when playing 15, 16: Aumente o dano em 5 ao jogar 15, 16 ou 17.
Aumente a saúde em 5 ao jogar 19 ou 20.
pt.If you take 18 or less damage, you have: Se você sofrer 18 ou menos de dano, há 50% de chance de bloquear todo o dano.
pt.Chance to deal double damage. %20: Chance de causar dano em dobro. %20
Receba 2 de dano para causar 3 de dano extra.
pt.Welcome! Are you ready to become a fearl: Bem-vindo! Está pronto para se tornar um pirata destemido?
pt.Now, let me explain some of the things y: Agora, deixe-me explicar algumas das coisas que você pode fazer.
pt.Join tournaments and defeat your opponen: Participe de torneios e derrote seus oponentes. Quem tiver mais troféus dita as regras!
pt.You will constantly receive random tasks: Você receberá tarefas aleatórias constantemente. Complete as tarefas e ganhe recompensas encontrando as cartas especificadas.
pt.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: Você ganha 2 estrelas por completar cada nível. Colete todas as estrelas para desbloquear recompensas.
pt.Collect your rewards at regular interval: Colete suas recompensas em intervalos regulares!
pt.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Resolva os quebra-cabeças divertidos. Eles ajudam você a ganhar recompensas.
pt.Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewa: Não se esqueça da roda com recompensas incríveis!
pt.You can check the current standings in t: Você pode verificar a classificação atual no torneio e o ranking geral.
pt.At the end of each level, you have a cha: No final de cada nível, você tem a chance de ganhar cartas. Complete coleções com essas cartas e ganhe recompensas.
pt.When it's your turn, you must draw a car: Quando for a sua vez, você deve comprar uma carta. Se você ultrapassar 21, não poderá atacar. Se acertar 21, seu dano será dobrado!
